entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023
